CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 薪资；报酬；酬金；酬劳；薪酬；报酬总额；工资总额
进行（斗争、讨论等）；持续从事（某活动）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指提供某种服务收取的固定费用。
多指通过劳动或投资等手段所得到的收入。
多用复数形式，指按小时、日或星期的报酬，通常指体力劳动者的工资。
与earnings含义很相近，但前者强调总收入。
指按年定下，按月或星期平均给予的报酬，指脑力劳动者的薪水。

word_group.brief_definition: 基本工资；最低生活保障工资
工资水平；工资级别；薪资水平
增加工资；工资增加；工资增长
工资率；工资标准；工资水平
减薪；扣除工资；降低工资待遇
打工仔；工薪族；工薪阶层
不错的工资；体面的工资；令人满意的工资

bilingual.source: His salary includes a basic wage and a post allowance.
bilingual.target: 他的工资包括基本工资和岗位津贴。

bilingual.source: The minimum wage is set by the government.
bilingual.target: 工资最低标准由政府制定。

bilingual.source: He works hard to earn a decent wage.
bilingual.target: 他努力工作以赚取一份体面的工资。

bilingual.source: The workers protested over the wage issues.
bilingual.target: 工人们因为工资问题而抗议。

bilingual.source: His salary is the equivalent of my monthly wage.
bilingual.target: 他的工资是我月薪的当量。

bilingual.source: She saves a portion of her wage every month.
bilingual.target: 她每个月都会存下一部分工资。

bilingual.source: They legislated to increase the minimum wage.
bilingual.target: 他们通过立法提高了最低工资。

bilingual.source: The average wage in this industry has decreased.
bilingual.target: 这个行业的平均工资有所下降。

bilingual.source: He negotiated a higher wage with his employer.
bilingual.target: 他与雇主谈判以获得更高的工资。

bilingual.source: Employees are entitled to a fair wage for their work.
bilingual.target: 员工有权利获得公平的工资。

list.abstract: wage（[weɪdʒ]），英语单词。作名词为工资；工钱；工资总额。作动词为进行；发动。例句：There is no lowest wage for children under 16.（16岁以下的儿童没有最低工资）。 作不及物动词时，近义词为progress、do。作名词时，近义词为price、expense、pay。作及物动词时，近义词为docarry with。

yingyinNormal.en: And when most low-wage workers are women, but Congress hasn't passed a minimum wage increase in seven years, it's long past time that women deserve a raise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大部分低工资的员工都是妇女，但国会已经七年没有通过提高最低工资标准的法案了，妇女们得到工资的上涨，应该是很长时间之前的事情了。

yingyinNormal.en: And one of the best would be to raise the minimum wage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中最好的一个办法将是提高最低工资标准。

yingyinNormal.en: The folks who keep blocking a minimum wage increase are running out of excuses. Let's give America a raise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一直阻挠提高最低工资标准的人们，他们的借口已经用完了。让我们给美国一个提高工资的机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Five more states have minimum wage initiatives on the ballot next month.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有五个州在下个月有就最低工资标准的投票议程。

yingyinNormal.en: But Congress hasn't voted to raise the minimum wage in seven years. Seven years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但国会已经七年没有就提高最低工资标准投票了。七年了

yingyinNormal.en: We've actually begun to see some modest wage growth in recent months. But most folks still haven't seen a raise in over a decade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 实际上，我们在最近几个月，已经开始看到一些适度的工资增长。但大部分人仍然在十多年来没能见到工资地上涨。

yingyinNormal.en: And raising the minimum wage would be one of the best ways to give a boost to working families.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提高最低工资标准则是为工薪家庭带来收入提升的最好途径。

yingyinNormal.en: Thirteen states and D.C. have done their part by raising their minimum wages. Four more states have minimum wage initiatives on the ballot this November.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全美有13个州和（华盛顿）哥伦比亚特区都提高了最低工资标准。还有4个州也将在11月对提高最低工资标准方案进行投票。

yingyinNormal.en: And the states where the minimum wage has gone up this year have experienced higher job growth than the states that haven't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些提高了最低工资标准的各州今年的就业增长更快。

yingyinNormal.en: About 28 million workers would benefit from an increase in the minimum wage to $10.10 an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 将近2800万的员工将从提高最低工资标准到每小时$10.10上受益。

yingyinNormal.en: It's time to stop punishing some of the hardest-working Americans. It's time to raise the minimum wage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 该结束这样惩罚辛勤工作国人的情况了。是提高最低工资标准的时候了。

yingyinNormal.en: But one of the simplest and fastest ways to start helping folks get ahead is by raising the minimum wage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但其中最简单最快捷的帮助人们取得成功的方式,是提高最低工资标准。

yingyinNormal.en: So you kind of act like a carbohydrate delivery system. Yeah. Call it whatever you want, I get minimum wage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这和碳水化合物传送系统有点象。是，随便你怎么叫，反正拿的工资最低。

yingyinNormal.en: Jackie, you have repeatedly opposed the minimum-wage and CEO salary bill I asked the leadership to introduce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰姬，你一再反对我想让领导层推行的《最低工资和高管薪酬标准法案》。

yingyinNormal.en: Most low-wage workers are women. And that extra money would help them pay the bills and provide for their families.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大多数低工资的人是妇女。这些额外的钱将帮助他们付清账单,并供养他们的家人。

yingyinNormal.en: Folks, it's long past due to increase the minimum wage that will lift millions of hardworking families out of poverty.
yingyinNormal.zh: 朋友们，提高最低工资标准已经提了很长时间了，走出这一步将让数百万工薪家庭摆脱贫困。

yingyinNormal.en: And in the year and a half since I first asked Congress to raise the minimum wage, Americans of all walks of life are doing just that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我首次向国会提出提高最低工资标准之后的一年半时间里，美国社会各界都积极做出努力。

yingyinNormal.en: Right now, a worker on the federal minimum wage earns $7.25 an hour. It's time to raise that to $10.10 an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当下,在联邦最低工资标准下,一个员工每小时可以挣到$7.25。是时候,将其提高到每小时$10.10了。

yingyinNormal.en: Ask yourself: could you live on $14,500 a year? That's what someone working full-time on the minimum wage makes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 问一下你自己:一年$14,500,你能生活地很幸福吗? 这正是一些全职工作的拿最低工资的人所挣到的薪水。

yingyinNormal.en: Raising the federal minimum wage to $10.10 an hour, or ten-ten would benefit 28 million American workers. 28 million.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提高联邦最低工资标准到每小时$10.10,或者10-10，将造福于美国2800万的国人。2800万。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a fixed regular payment, typically paid on a daily or weekly

examination_example.sentence: Imagine that you favor increasing the minimum <highlight>wage</highlight> in our state, and I do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下，你赞成提高我们州的最低工资，而我不赞成。

examination_example.sentence: For factory owners, it all adds up to stiff competition for workers – and upward pressure on <highlight>wages</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于工厂主来说，这一切都加剧了工人的激烈竞争——以及工资上涨的压力。

examination_example.sentence: In many rich countries average <highlight>wages</highlight> in the state sector are higher than in the private one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多富裕国家，国有部门的平均工资高于私营部门。

examination_example.sentence: For them, history did nothing, it possessed no immense wealth nor <highlight>waged</highlight> battles: "It is man, real, living man who does all that."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他们来说，历史什么也没做，它不拥有巨大的财富，也没有发动战争：“做这一切的是真实的、活着的人。”

sense_info_list.en: the part of total production that is the return to labor as earned income as distinct from the remuneration received by capital as unearned income

word_usage.usage: wage作名词表示“薪资，工资”，通常用复数形式。

wage作动词时，多用作及物动词，可接名词或代词作宾语，其宾语后可接介词against/on sb./sth.表示“同……作战”。例：
In the Middle Ages England waged war on France. 
在中世纪，英格兰向法国发动了战争。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指体力劳动所得的报酬，如熟练工人、售货员等的固定工资，可按小时、按天、或按周领取。
指脑力劳动所得的报酬，如工程师、教师、政府官员、管理人员等的固定薪金，可按周、按月、按季或按年领取。
泛指所得的报酬，为不可数名词。
比pay更加正式，是可数名词，而且经常用复数。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a fixed regular payment, typically paid on a daily or weekly

examination_example.sentence: On many occasions, the entrepreneurs reported not paying themselves a <highlight>wage</highlight> at all initially in order to cover salaries and expenses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在许多情况下，创业者报告称，最初根本没有为自己支付工资，以支付薪水和开支。

examination_example.sentence: A low <highlight>wage</highlight> for elementary school teachers, however, doesn't mean elementary education isn't important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，小学教师的工资低并不意味着基础教育不重要。

examination_example.sentence: The value of what the student can produce is reflected in the <highlight>wage</highlight> employers are willing to pay the student to produce it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生可以创造的价值体现在雇主愿意支付的工资上。

sense_info_list.en: carry on a war or campaign

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a fixed regular payment; typically paid on a daily or weekly

examination_example.sentence: These experts argue that focusing on <highlight>wage</highlight> is the wrong approach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些专家认为关注工资是错误的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Those external factors include the difficulties accompanying low-<highlight>wage</highlight> work or structural discrimination based on race, gender, or ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些外部因素包括低工资工作所带来的困难或基于种族、性别或能力的结构性歧视。

examination_example.sentence: As <highlight>wages</highlight> have fallen, the share of young men living in the home of their parent (s) has risen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着工资的下降，住在父母家里的年轻男性的比例上升了。

examination_example.sentence: Similarly with earnings, young men's <highlight>wages</highlight> (after adjusting for inflation) have been on a downward trajectory (轨迹) since 1970 and fell significantly form 2000 to 2010.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 薪资的情形与此类似，年轻人的工资(经通胀调整后)自1970年以来一直在走下坡路，并在2000至2010年间下降显著。

sense_info_list.en: the part of total production that is the return to labor as earned income as distinct from the remuneration received by capital as unearned income

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The lowest <highlight>wage</highlight> for 16-17 years old teenagers should be no less than 7 dollars per hour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 16-17岁青少年的最低工资应该不低于每小时7美元。

examination_example.sentence: There is no lowest <highlight>wage</highlight>(工资) for children under 16.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 16岁以下的儿童没有最低工资。
